title: End-to-End Testing
description: End-to-end (E2E) tests simulate real user behaviour by interacting with your application through the UI. They provide the highest confidence but are slower and more complex than other test types.

content.text: E2E tests run your full application in a browser-like environment and perform actions such as clicking buttons, filling forms, and navigating pages.

items: To ensure the whole system works together
To catch issues unit/integration tests miss
